channel.title: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack
channel.description: I like dubstep and I like Auxy to produce on cuz it’s easy, so if Auxy realised a dubstep pack that could be rly cool!

item.title: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack
item.dc:creator: KJCannon101
item.description:
Not sure why you’re responding to me when I’m not the one that was looking for dubstep examples… Besides the overall topic was already addressed twice…

To summarize,
OP was looking for soundpacks that fit the dubstep genre. Two responses followed, confirming that there are soundpacks that fit the genre with examples listed afterwards.

If you wanted to add to the examples tell the OP not those that already gave examples. (OP = Original Poster)

Read full topic

item.source: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack

item.title: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack
item.dc:creator: Chimpan-T
item.description:
I’ve thought of an idea of a soundpack.
Bass,
Yoi- an old skool yoi bass
Flipper- like drill but slower and more PHAT
Expand- kinda like a motorbike engine
Abyss- like breath and mummy combined
Lead,
Meteor- a hum combined with spray
Tornado- spiral but faster with a whistle combined
Lightning- degrade and restart combined
Piano,
Spooked- a dark vibe to a piano

And plus flipper or lightning should be a demo sound

And @Auxy, if you let this happen, I’ll be speechless.
And thx if you do!

Read full topic
item.source: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack

item.title: Yo there should be a dubstep soundpack
item.dc:creator: KJCannon101
item.description:
Disturbing Leads, Panic Attack and 7 Skies: The Future already fill the role for melodic sounds. Neurofunk and Superfluidity for drums. Could there be more, sure but there are less represented genres.

Read full topic
